item.title: Correlation and Covariance
item.description: RECIPE Intro to Correlation Intro to Covariance Difference between Correlation and Covariance Hypothesis test about a correlation, \(\rho\) Testing difference between two correlation coefficients Visualizing correlation Scatter plot Visualizing correlation matrices Symbolic Number Coding Scatter Plot Matrix Network Plot Correlogram Correlation What? A correlation, r is a statistical way that describes the degree of relationship between two quantitative variables.
